Seismic Time-Domain Modeling


#


SIT.Fdtd.__init__
 — 
Method
.


test function


source


#


SIT.Fdtd.fdtd_born_mod
 — 
Method
.


born modeling


source


#


SIT.Fdtd.fdtd_mod
 — 
Method
.


As forward modeling method, the  finite-difference method is employed.  It uses a discrete version of the two-dimensional isotropic acoustic wave equation. As shown in   Figure~ ef{fdshmesh_acou}, a staggered-grid mesh is used 


Arguments




jobname
: dominant frequency


npropwav
: number of wavefields propagating independently in the same medium time-domain grid


model
: Seismic Model


``




source
